name: Kevin
chief_complaint: anger management issues and struggles with academic performance relating to ADD

cognitive: difficulties with organization, trouble focusing on tasks
behavioral: avoidance of academic responsibilities when upset

mental_status: Patient is capable of reflection on his behavior and possesses a level of self-awareness about his actions and their motivations.
diagnosis: Attention Deficit Disorder with a consideration for anger management issues

current_psychiatric_treatment.adherence_and_side_effects: reports taking off the patch when it starts to fall off or itch

current_significant_relationships: close to father, and maintains a long-distance romantic relationship through texting
history_of_present_illness: challenges with ADD have been present for multiple years, recent increase in anger episodes has been notable
history_of_psychological_problem_impact: struggles with consistent school performance and homework submission, incidents of physical aggression as a response to external stressors
personal_history: expresses active interests in activities such as fishing and sports shooting, works part time for family business
medical_history_and_limitations: no physical limitations reported, on medication for ADD
